description:
Red It is a Reddit browser for TouchPad.

Red It makes it easy and fun to browse Reddit on your TouchPad. Browse your favorite subreddits. View the list of stories in the subreddit on the left while reading stories on the right. Vote, comment, submit stories, and reply to comments.

Red It is Free Software licensed under the GPLv3. You can check out the code at GitHub at https://github.com/zylogz80/Red-It.
versionNote: Icon or text buttons. Subreddit browsing, subscriptions, and searching. Rich formatting for comments and self posts with tap-able in-line links. Swipe stories in the left pane to vote on the without reading them. "Un vote" but submitting the same vote again. Back and forward buttons to view more stories in a subreddit. More sharing options including Twitter, copy URL, and open in browser card. NSFW warnings. Bug fixes, other enhancements, and overall speed improvements.
